article_title: Obama: 'I'm not going to walk away' from ACA
article_text: - President Obama defended his health-care law during a long question and answer session about the Affordable Care Act Friday. “I'm not going to walk away from 40 million people who have the chance to get health insurance for the first time," he said. ()
